about_the_game:
~~~~~~~~~HONEYCASTER~~~~~~~~~


HoneyCaster allows Windows users to draw on their friends screen while they play a game, or just provide an easy to use shared canvas for sharing ideas/skills :)

~~~~~~~~~How To Use~~~~~~~~~

➡ To Click through the application you must toggle drawing


!!Drawee, line up the game to HoneyCaster, and using your favorite screen sharing application, share the game!!
!!Drawer, in your favorite screen sharing application, line up honeycaster to their screen!!

Idealy, you should now be able to draw on the shared canvas 1-1 :)

~~~~~~~~~ROADMAP~~~~~~~~~

Additions I plan on adding(meaning not in the game yet steam):

⠀⠀⠀More ☆s' means sooner, kinda like priority :)

☆☆☆☆⠀⠀ Brushes, Tools:
Thinking of tools and brushes that'll make this a viable art application (Eyedropper, bucket, speckle brush)

☆☆☆⠀⠀⠀ Animated Layers:
Horizontal from layers turning a layer into a set fps animation

☆⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀Pen Pressure:
At some point, when I get access to a drawing tablet, I'll make this my highest priority!

likely more to come as I think of them!

Added from the roadmap:

v2.0⠀⠀⠀ Public/Private Lobbies:
A lobby selection screen for lobbies + password protected lobbies

v2.0⠀⠀⠀⠀Importing canvases:
Saving and importing projects

v2.0⠀⠀⠀⠀Syncing Canvas(host):
A button the host can press that'll pause drawing and sync their canvas with all joined players
